item.title: GENIUS Act Bombshell? Banking Groups Demand Stablecoin Interest Loophole Close Before Cash Flees
item.description:
Major U.S. banking trade groups have urged Congress to address a GENIUS Act loophole that lets stablecoin affiliates offer interest to token holders. item.title: Linux 6.18 With Nouveau Driver Will Default To Using GSP Firmware
item.description: A change queued in drm-misc-next for DRM-Next ahead of the Linux 6.18 kernel cycle later this year is promoting the Nouveau driver for open-source NVIDIA GPU support to be using the GSP firmware by default. This reflects the reality that using the NVIDIA GPU System Processor "GSP" firmware with Turing and Ampere GPUs should provide a better experience than the older firmware alternative with Nouveau...
